name: esmbot
description: A Discord bot with miscellaneous features

scripts.build: npm run build-natives && npm run build-ffmpeg
scripts.build-ffmpeg: cd ffmpeg/; { echo 'Configuring the FFmpeg build. This might take a while...' && sh ./configure --fatal-warnings --enable-gpl --enable-version3 --enable-nonfree --enable-libesmbot --enable-libvips --enable-libvpx --enable-libopus --enable-libx264 --enable-openssl --disable-encoders --enable-encoder=png --enable-encoder=mjpeg --enable-encoder=gif --enable-encoder=libvpx_vp8 --enable-encoder=libopus --enable-encoder=libx264 --enable-encoder=libx264rgb --enable-encoder=aac --enable-encoder=wrapped_avframe --disable-outdevs --disable-indevs --enable-indev=lavfi --disable-muxers --enable-muxer=image2 --enable-muxer=gif --enable-muxer=webm --enable-muxer=mp4 --enable-muxer=null --assert-level=1 --disable-doc && make -j $(grep -c ^processor /proc/cpuinfo) && cd .. && exit 0; } || { cd .. && exit 1; }

author: Essem <essem@essem.space>
